code: import styles from"../Styles/MobileBasket.module.scss";import emptyCardImg from"../Images/empty_cart.svg";import BasketItem from"../Components/BasketItem";import{BasketContext}from"../Contexts/BasketContext";import{useContext}from"react";import GetIcon from"../Components/GetIcon";import Title from"../Components/Title";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const MobileBasket=()=>{const{basketItems,basketTotal:_basketTotal}=useContext(BasketContext);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:styles.mobileBasket,children:basketItems.length>0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[basketItems.map((item,key)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(BasketItem,{data:item},key)),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:styles.basketTotal,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:styles.total,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Title,{txt:"basket summary",size:23,transform:"uppercase"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(GetIcon,{icon:"BsFillCartCheckFill",size:25})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:styles.totalPrice,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("small",{children:"total"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:styles.price,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:_basketTotal.toFixed(2)})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"button",className:styles.confirmBtn,children:"Confirm the basket"})]})]}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:styles.emptyBasket,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:emptyCardImg,alt:""}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Title,{txt:"your basket is empty",size:23,transform:"uppercase"})]})});};export default MobileBasket;
